page.title: 05HOUSES AND HOMES
page.content:
Most of us live in{houses}but some in{bungalows.}There are lots of cars parked on the roads because there is at least one car per household, sometimes two, and lots of people don't own a garage.
There are narrow alleys connecting the streets; these are called{jitties} or {jennels}. These are short cuts which save time when going from one place to another. As we walk along them, we can see the gardens which belong to the houses: the flowers and vegetables, garden sheds and the fences all different colours, red, blue and white.
